name: inline-exterminator
description: Takes inline style tags from input, removes them, and outputs a css file with classes matching inline styles

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/index.js tests/example.jsp -o example_jsp.css --no-replace modified
scripts.test-dir: npm run build && node dist/index.js -d tests -o example_dir.css --no-replace modified
scripts.test-rec: npm run build && node dist/index.js -r -d tests -o example_rec.css --no-replace modified
scripts.build: babel src --out-dir dist && npm run shebang

author: Flascher
